name: Mine Flower
description:
Use Arrow Keys for movement

A tiny platformer in which you use an axe to help you navigate the dangerous mines in search of a flower to cure your daughter…at least that was what the story was mean to be.

Once again time played a trick on us and we found ourselves scrambling to try to finish this. We didn’t get to add in everything we wanted including some of the environment art Kingslee made. anyways hope you enjoy the little game we created.

How To Play:

Arrows - Left and Right

Z - to jump 

X - to swing your axe.

You can hang onto walls by jumping onto them and holding down the Axe Button, This will also allow you to slide down as you go Deeper and Deeper into the caves.

Menu music - Cinematic moments - dreamy- sappy1D29 by Setuniman at freesound.org

Change Log - Broken Door at level start fixed. Camera bug at level end fixed. Added WebGL Build
